JobFullDesc: At Facebook Reality Labs, our goal is to invent the user input and interface technologies that will drive the next generation of virtual, augmented, and mixed reality experiences. We are looking for a talented Research Scientist with expertise and passion for building advanced sensing systems aimed at solving complex input and interaction problems. As a Research Scientist, you would focus on developing interaction techniques for novel wearable sensing solutions as well as on incorporating contextual, environment, and biological signals to enable rich and expressive interactions for AR/VR scenarios.Ideal candidates will have a passion for the intersection of science, design, and engineering of novel interaction solutions. Researchers are expected to integrate their work into real-time interactive systems in our lab and validate their solutions through user evaluations to determine how specific engineering choices impact user experience. Researchers will have the opportunity to publish in peer-reviewed conferences and journals and are expected to effectively collaborate with cross-disciplinary experts, including applied machine learning, electrical, mechanical, and software engineering, perceptual science, and design.Plan and execute a research agenda to advance novel sensing and interaction solutions for AR/VR.Collaborate
